headline: Kriya, Odyssey secure ‘megarounds’; Amgen boosts R&D leadership
summary: Kriya’s $320 million raise ranks as one of the year’s largest private funding rounds. Elsewhere, a Genentech veteran joined Amgen and Merck and Daiichi touted results for a new kind of antibody-drug conjugate.

raw.headline: Kriya, Odyssey secure ‘megarounds’; Amgen boosts R&D leadership
raw.summary: Kriya’s $320 million raise ranks as one of the year’s largest private funding rounds. Elsewhere, a Genentech veteran joined Amgen and Merck and Daiichi touted results for a new kind of antibody-drug conjugate.

headline: Pharma’s new boomtown? Why drugmakers are setting up shop in a small Swiss city.
summary: While the EU and UK attempt to lure scientists with new financial incentives, Basel’s stable economy and emphasis on science remains a draw.
